title: CBIC Launches Online Module for Voluntary Post-Clearance Revision of Bills of Entry
content:
# CBIC Launches Online Module for Voluntary Post-Clearance Revision of Bills of Entry

Ek important update hai! Government ne importers ke liye Customs Act, 1962 ke Section 18A ke under voluntary post-clearance revision of Bills of Entry ke liye ek naya online module operationalize kiya hai.

Yeh naya online facility, jise importers ICEGATE portal ke through electronic tareeke se revision requests submit kar sakte hain, December 19, 2025 ko report kiya gaya tha.

*   **Kya Hai Yeh Update?** Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) ne Indian Customs Electronic System (ICES) mein ek online module shuru kiya hai. Isse importers goods clear hone ke baad bhi apne Bills of Entry ko voluntarily revise kar sakte hain.
*   **Kyun Yeh Important Hai?** Pehle Bills of Entry mein post-clearance corrections cumbersome hote the. Section 18A of the Customs Act, 1962, ab importers ko clerical, classification, valuation, ya procedural errors ko theek karne ki facility deta hai.
*   **Legal Framework:** Is initiative ka base CBIC Notification No. 70/2025-Customs (N.T.) dated October 30, 2025 aur CBIC Circular No. 26/2025-Customs dated October 31, 2025 hai, jinhone is revision ke liye legal framework aur detailed guidelines set kiye the.
